scripts.start: npm run server & npm run client & npm run admin
scripts.front: npm run client & npm run admin
scripts.build-server: cd server && cp package.json dist && cp -r public dist && cd dist && cp -r * ../../production
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && cd build && mkdir -p ../../production/public && rm -rf ../../production/public/* && cp -r * ../../production/public
scripts.build-admin: cd admin && npm run build && cd build && mkdir -p ../../production/admin && rm -rf ../../production/admin/* && cp -r * ../../production/admin
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client && npm run build-admin
